identity.aesthetic: Modern Minimalist, Swiss-inspired High Contrast, Clean
identity.theme_strategy: Light Mode Default (Freshness) with Dark Mode Option (Power User)

headings.usage: All headings (h1-h6), Hero text, Big stats

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI labels, Data tables, Inputs

mono.usage: Price values in data grids, Code snippets, IDs

primary.name: Fresh Emerald
primary.usage: Primary Buttons, Active States, Success Indicators, Price Savings

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlay on Hero sections to reduce digital flatness

landing_page.structure: Asymmetric grid (Tetris style). Hero takes 2/3 width, supporting visuals take 1/3. Use generous whitespace (py-24, gap-8).

dashboard.structure: Sidebar navigation (fixed). Main content area with 4-column grid. Widgets span 1-2 columns. Data tables take full width.

social_feed.structure: Single column feed (max-w-2xl mx-auto). Infinite scroll. Cards have distinct actions (Like, Comment, Compare).

buttons.primary: bg-emerald-500 hover:bg-emerald-600 text-white font-semibold rounded-full px-8 py-3 shadow-lg shadow-emerald-500/20 transition-all hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 font-medium rounded-full px-6 py-3
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-emerald-600 hover:bg-emerald-50 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.default: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow p-6

inputs.style: bg-slate-50 border-slate-200 focus:border-emerald-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-100 rounded-lg h-11 px-4 transition-all

charts.style: Minimalist. Remove grid lines where possible. Use curveMonotone for lines. Tooltips must be custom styled (glassmorphism).

hero_bg.usage: Hero section background with overlay or side image

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Rounded line joins.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
motion.list_stagger: variants={{ hidden: { opacity: 0 }, show: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }}

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is Slate-900 on light backgrounds. Use Slate-500 for secondary text, never lighter.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings (emerald-500) on all interactive elements.
accessibility.aria: All icon-only buttons must have aria-label.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical (p-8, p-12).
Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 or Slate-950.
Interactive elements must have hover and active states.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the design system using Tailwind CSS and Shadcn UI. Customize the default Shadcn components to match the 'Fresh Emerald' and 'Deep Slate' theme. Use the provided image URLs for the landing page. Ensure the dashboard uses the high-density grid layout.
